testcase.name: test.tests.01-run.testfunc
testcase.system-out:
ssh -t iotlab@saclay.iot-lab.info 'socat - tcp:nrf52dk-1.saclay.iot-lab.info:20000' main(): This is RIOT! (Version: buildtest) test_shell. > echo a string echo a string "echo""a""string" > end_test end_test [TEST_END] > ps ps pid | state Q | pri 1 | pending Q | 15 2 | running Q | 7 > reboot reboot main(): This is RIOT! (Version: buildtest) test_shell. > 123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890 123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890 shell: command not found: 123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890 >
help
> > help Command Description --------------------------------------- start_test starts a test end_test ends a test echo prints the input command reboot Reboot the node ps Prints information about running threads. app_metadata Returns application metadata > unknown_command unknown_command shell: command not found: unknown_command > start_test start_test [TEST_START] >
